profile_summary:
Hi! :)
My name is Constanza, I'm Venezuelan/Argentinian with 10+ years of experience supporting technical, sales, and customer teams in adopting new systems, processes, and tools. Skilled in coordinating cross-functional launches, configuring solutions to operational needs, and training diverse teams to ensure successful implementation. Experienced in retail, customer experience, and digital solutions with the ability to bridge technical workflows and user adoption. 

Fluent in Spanish, English, and Portuguese, with international experience across Europe and Latin America.

company_summary_description:
ELNOR is an edtech startup that provides English learning materials and personalized tutoring to adults living in refugee camps. People in camps are amongst the most disadvantaged in the world, and while their immediate needs of food, shelter, and safety are the focus of international entities and governments, education welfare remains overlooked as a necessity. We believe that language learning allows for self-expression for those who are seeking relief and brings professional and social opportunities when establishing a new life.

ELNOR has begun a pilot program with a group of adults in Europe‚Äôs largest refugee camp, Moria, which after the fire in September 2020 has been relocated to other areas of the Greek island of Lesbos. Many people living in refugee camps have very limited access to formal modes of education, and the COVID-19 disruptions put them at a greater disadvantage as it disconnected them from in-person volunteer tutors while they have limited access to internet and electronic devices to participate in virtual learning programs.

Adapting the technology to fit the needs and wifi connectivity of our students, we have been innovating ways that we can connect with them and expand our services to reach more people within Moria and beyond.

company_summary_description: E‚Äô un movimento di opinione indipendente senza scopi di lucro, nato per promuovere, coordinare e sostenere le iniziative delle donne che operano nel campo delle arti, delle professioni e degli affari. In Italia conta circa 11.000 socie,  suddivise in circa 300 Sezioni.  FIDAPA aderisce alla International Federation of Business and Professional Women - BPW, presente in 95 Paesi del mondo. Obiettivi di FIDAPA BPW Italy sono: valorizzare le competenze delle socie indirizzandole verso attivit√† sociali e culturali che favoriscono il miglioramento della vita, anche lavorativa, delle donne; incoraggiare le donne a un continuo impegno e a una consapevole partecipazione alla vita sociale, amministrativa e politica;  essere portavoce delle donne presso le Organizzazioni e le Istituzioni nazionali, europee ed internazionali. Fin dalla sua fondazione nel 1929, FIDAPA  si adopera per rimuovere ogni forma di discriminazione a sfavore delle donne, sia nell'ambito della famiglia sia in quello del lavoro, nel pieno rispetto delle norme vigenti in materia di pari opportunit√†. Questi obiettivi vengono perseguiti attraverso l‚Äôorganizzazione di convegni, tavole rotonde, seminari, incontri, progetti, nonch√© mostre e premi.   FIDAPA BPW Italy √® presente √® presente nel Comitato Parit√† presso Il Ministero del Lavoro e delle Politiche Sociali e nella Lobby Europea delle donne.  BPW gode di status consultivo presso il Consiglio Economico e Sociale delle Nazioni Unite e di status partecipativo presso il Consiglio d‚ÄôEuropa, ha le sue rappresentanti nelle pi√π importanti organizzazioni internazionali, tra cui UNESCO, UNICEF e FAO.   https://it-it.facebook.com/fidapamb

company_summary_description:
Skeletos IT Services specializes in: 
* Cloud Technology 
* DevOps 
* Enterprise Software Development 
* Product Engineering 
* Mobile App Development 
* Digital Sustainability solutions 
* Datacenter & Infrastructure Management 
* Data Migration  
* Data Center Migration 

As part of our comprehensive approach, we offer business analysis, business process re-engineering, and business process automation to create cutting-edge IT solutions that are customised to our customers' needs.  

Banking and Finance | Healthcare | Edutech & E-learning | Insurance | Manufacturing and Automotive | Mining and Minerals | Communication 
 

Skeletos was founded in October 2017. It is one of the fastest, secure and reliable companies in Pune. Mr. Pramod Waikar is Chief Executive Officer and Founder of the company and has 21 years of experience in the IT field. Skeletos helps to build business ideas into reality with new techniques. Skeletos is helping businesses to build infrastructure management, DevOps, Enterprises applications, Web, mobile, and talent It is having two offices. One is located in Deccan, Pune and the Second one is in Middletown USA.

I have been working in the IT sector for the past 20 Years And with all my experience and Knowledge I have come up with One Place for All the Digital Solutions for your organization Skeletos

Skeletos‚Äô is a young and fast-growing IT services start-up, based in Pune. Our Key specialization includes Software Development, Mobile Development, Web Application solution, IT Services, Cloud, and DevOps.

company_location_locations: [{"continent": "Africa", "country": "Ghana", "state": "West Legon", "city": "Accra", "street": "Westlands Boulevard", "raw_address": "Westlands Boulevard, Accra, West Legon, Ghana, Africa", "position": {"lng": -1.0800271, "lat": 8.030028}}]
company_summary_description:
We are revolutionising business in Ghana and improving the way service is conducted and given throughout Ghana. SearchLocal allows you to see businesses based on location for example a painter in Osu, you‚Äôll then be able to see all painters in this geographic based on review score. The platform allows you to interact with genuine tradespeople / businesses. We have been collecting data not present on Google or online for years, my teams have been in the streets conducting the research and interviewing people one by one. 

Our mission is to connect the industry to the consumer no matter where they are in Accra first and foremost. Having access to reliable and accountable tradespeople at a competitive price in a swift manner. This will greatly put women and the underrepresented on the map!

Furthermore there are challenges facing tradespeople and artisans - Minimal budget, No digital presence, Relying on Word of mouth, lack of digital reviews on their services which our platform seeks to mitigate. In doing so minimizing exposure to rogue tradespeople. 

Platform Features
-Submit jobs locally for artisans to bid on. For example paint my house in Osu.
-Search for artisans by location , category and review score.
-Bid on jobs listed on the platform
-Payment System exists for customer to pay artisan via SearchLocal for complete peace of mind.
-Analytics and Insights - Tools for tracking performance and customer engagement
-Algorithms to match posted jobs to tradespeople and artisans
-Comprehensive Profiles: Detailed profiles with reviews and ratings.
-10,000s of Data items that has been collected over the years. Covering the job disciplines mentioned earlier in point 1.

The APP and Website are in the final stages and we will be launching the platform very soon. Do stand by ü´°

Any further questions or enquiries , please reach Jason Adjalo on 0551863389

My biggest projects included the Tanzania Oil and Gas Summit, Kuwait Oil and Gas Conference & Exhibition and the Arab Industries Conference and Exhibition which will be held in Jeddah in KSA.

The Tanzania Oil and Gas Summit is in collaboration with Ministry of Energy, TPDC and the Government and supported by PURA, EWURA, NEEC & TPSF. It also has the presence of majors such as Shell, Equinor, Dodsal, Total, Pan African Energy and Songas.

The Kuwait Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition will be held on the 6th to the 8th of October in 2020. It is led by the Industry via the specially set up Steering Committee which consists of K-Companies, Ministry, Government and key Industry players. Led by Hashem Sayed Hashem, Deputy Chairman & CEO OF Kuwait Petroleum Company and Waleed Al-Bader the CEO of KNPC. Players include Shell, Schlumberger, Total, GOFSCO, Weatherford, Dow, Equate, Petrofac, Fluor, ABB et al.

Another project is the Ghana Oil, Gas & Power Summit held annually in Accra next edition likely to be 2021. This Involves liaising with Government figures, various Ministries, International & NOCs, Indigenous organisations, service companies and other industry stakeholders in putting together Ghana's biggest Energy platform.

Africa Energy Week series in Cape Town and Accra.

Middle East Oil and Gas Logistics in Dubai.
8th World LNG Summit in Barcelona
The American Gas Operations conference in association with the AGA in America
2009 Nigeria Infrastructure Exhibition in Abuja.
Nigeria Oil and Gas series.

profile_summary:
Seasoned Entrepreneur and Business Leader with a proven track record in founding and scaling successful companies across diverse industries. As Founder and CEO of ONESTOP Company for Training, Development, and Consulting, I leverage my extensive experience to drive growth, innovation, and exceptional client outcomes.

My expertise spans strategic leadership, business development, training, consulting, and financial management. I have a passion for building high-performing teams, fostering a culture of excellence, and delivering tailored solutions that address complex business challenges.

Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a strong ability to identify market opportunities, navigate dynamic environments, and achieve sustainable growth. With a focus on client satisfaction, operational efficiency, and ethical business practices, I am committed to making a positive impact on organizations and communities.

profile_summary:
I was born in Viareggio (LU), and I studied in Parma. I have an MD in Law and MA in Trade Marketing Management both at Parma University in 1995 and 1999.
I worked inside the Italian Mass Market Retail from 1996, before as a manager from the producer‚Äôs side, then from the retail side.
In 2005 together with some friends, we set up the first Italian ON Line Magazine around Mass Market Retail: ‚ÄúGDONews‚Äù even if, during the following years, I worked also as a strategic consultant for some well known Italian retail companies.

GDONews, actually, is one of the most well known Magazine around the italian Mass Market and it is an operative partner of Fiere di Parma Cibus, the most important Trade Fair of italian food

company_summary_description:
Flightradar24 tracks positions of aircraft in real-time and turns that data into engaging consumer and business applications. The data comes primarily from a proprietary, crowd-sourced network of 50,000+ so-called ADS-B receivers hosted by private individuals and companies all over the world and tracks 250,000+ flights per day. This network of ADS-B receivers is the largest in the world.   

In addition to ADS-B data, Flightradar24 is able to get positional data for non-ADS-B equipped aircraft through the use of Multilateration (MLAT). The ADS-B and MLAT data is merged with schedule and flight status data from airlines and airports to create a unique flight tracking experience. You can read more about how Flightradar24 works here:
http://www.flightradar24.com/how-it-works 

Each day Flightradar24 has over 5 million unique users and our app has been the #1 selling app overall in Apple‚Äôs App Store in over 130 countries. Most airlines and many other companies in the aviation industry (including Airbus, Boeing and Embraer) use our services. The Flightradar24 app has been downloaded more than 100 million times. Flightradar24 is frequently featured in the media:

Wall Street Journal
http://www.wsj.com/articles/the-men-who-know-where-every-flight-is-1440610114

Reuters
http://www.reuters.com/article/2015/05/18/us-airlines-flightradar-idUSKBN0O31Q720150518

The Daily Mail
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2204838/Rush-hour-skies-Real-time-map-shows-plane-air-right-now.html

Bild
http://www.bild.de/digital/handy-und-telefon/apps/neue-live-apps-fuer-das-smartphone-25031054.bild.html

Le Monde
http://bigbrowser.blog.lemonde.fr/2012/07/02/une-application-pour-savoir-ou-vont-ces-avions-qui-passent-dans-le-ciel
company_summary_overview:
Flightradar24 is an internet-based service that shows real-time aircraft flight information on a map. It includes flight tracks, origins and destinations, flight numbers, aircraft types, positions, altitudes, headings, and speeds.


Flightradar24 can also show time-lapse replays of previous tracks and historical flight data by airline, aircraft, aircraft type, area, or airport. It aggregates data from multiple sources but, outside of the USA, mostly from crowdsourced information gathering by volunteers with ADS-B receivers.


The service was founded in 2007 by Svenska Resen√§tverket AB.
company_summary_seo: Flightradar24 is the best live flight tracker that shows air traffic in real time. Best coverage and cool features!

profile_summary:
Une recette r√©ussie, c‚Äôest celle qui met en lumi√®re ce qu‚Äôon aime ‚Äî avec humilit√©, car la qualit√© du produit est la mati√®re premi√®re du cuisinier. Et l‚Äôenvie de cuisiner et faire plaisir est la seule chose qui compte pour moi.	
Pour exprimer ma passion des beaux produits, j‚Äôai rapidement conclu qu‚Äôil fallait que j‚Äôouvre mon propre restaurant.
√Ä l‚Äôabri des courants √©ph√©m√®res et des modes culinaires, Les P‚Äôtits Fayots ont concr√©tis√© durant plus de 10 ans cet essentiel : gourmandise, exigence et g√©n√©rosit√©.
L‚Äôaccueil, les assiettes et le service d√©clinaient chacune des qualit√©s que j‚Äôaffectionne : attention, g√©n√©rosit√©, sobri√©t√©.
Aujourd‚Äôhui, une nouvelle page s‚Äôouvre avec un projet qui permet √† ma cuisine de sortir du restaurant et d‚Äô√™tre ainsi plus largement partag√©e. Une cuisine plus ouverte, encore plus g√©n√©reuse mais toujours aussi exigeante dans le choix des produits et des savoir-faire culinaires.

skills: Coaching, Business Development, Executive Coaching, Entrepreneurship, Leadership, Management, Recruiting, Start-ups, Small Business, Team Building, Management Development, Business Planning, Personal Development, Master Practitioner in NLP, Emerging Markets, Event Management, Executive Management, Training, Emotional Intelligence, Human Resources
company_keywords: business coaching, leadership coaching, executive development, managing transition and change, performance enhancement, organisational strategy

company_location_locations: [{"city": "London", "street": "33 St James's Square", "postal_code": "SW1Y 4JS", "raw_address": "33 St James's Square, London", "position": {"lng": -0.128427, "lat": 51.51649}}]
company_summary_description:
Founded in 2008 by Amanda Pelham Green, and now with Sophie Turner as an Associate, odysseymentor has a depth of experience working with an eclectic mix of international leaders and their complicated agendas ‚Äì in the entrepreneurial sector, with SMEs and wide-ranging global companies. 

We coach leaders who may face a sticking point, who seek clarity or need to manage transition. Our clients find purpose and meaning, develop leadership capability, explore strategies, and turn vision into action ‚Äì so they can be at their best in this fast changing business environment.

We want our international clients to reach the goals they set for themselves and their company. Our role is to build clients‚Äô capabilities, to help them achieve a sense of personal fulfilment and satisfaction, and ultimately to achieve improved business performance.  

Our business coaching style is collaborative, an energising mix of focus and fun. We bring challenge, empathy and trust to the table, and share a collective understanding of business reality. Our clients are supported to develop their potential and resilience, to deal more effectively with increasing commercial complexity, and to manage relationships across their organisations.  Above all, we give them the space and time to think.

profile_summary:
I work with senior executives ‚Äì leaders, company directors and SME founders ‚Äì and with businesses large and small. In particular, I coach those who seek clarification and focus in order to help them explore such issues as managing transition, improving their performance, or defining a substantive future for their business or themselves. 

My role is to build my clients‚Äô capabilities and to help them succeed. Their individual needs and situations drive both the agenda and my tailored response. In an increasingly turbulent world, I give them dedicated time to think and encourage them to identify, structure and execute outcomes and solutions ‚Äì and ultimately to turn their vision into action.  

They engage me as a business coach because ‚Äì so they tell me ‚Äì I give them the confidence to step-up to challenges, address and confront issues, and to define objectives and develop their potential. In that way, I help them to realise their aims, become more productive and so achieve transformational results. 

Specialities: Executive coaching, managing transition, purpose and meaning, performance enhancement, business development. 


Qualifications:
Certified Business Coach (CBC‚Ñ¢) World Association of Business Coaches (WABC)‚Ñ¢ 
Member of the European Mentoring and Coaching Council (EMCC)‚Ñ¢ 
Affiliate Member, Institute of Coaching Professional Association at McLean Hospital, Harvard Medical School
Meyler Campbell trained Business Coach
Master Practitioner in Neuro Linguistic Programming 
‚ÄòThinking Partnership‚Äô training within Nancy Kline‚Äôs ‚ÄòThinking Environment‚Äô¬Æ programme

profile_summary:
Highly motivated and results-driven Media Buyer and Sales funnel strategist with proven success in driving significant revenue and lead generation for businesses across diverse industries, including e-commerce, affiliate marketing, travel, network marketing, and political campaigns. Skilled in Facebook and Instagram advertising, Building Sale Funnels , Mapping Funnel , Optimizing Sales Funnel , content creation, social media strategy, and campaign optimization, with a track record of exceeding client expectations.
-
Key Achievements:
-
1. Generated over 100M in sales and 500,000+ leads for clients through effective Facebook advertising campaigns.
2. Delivered 5000+ qualified buyers to client businesses, boosting conversion rates and ROI.
3. Managed advertising accounts for small businesses, politicians, and organizations, achieving high ROAS and ROI.
4. Developed and implemented comprehensive social media advertising strategies for diverse client needs.
5. Created engaging content for various Facebook business pages, driving page growth and brand awareness.
6. Conducted corporate trainings on social media advertising and content marketing, empowering businesses for online success.
7. Optimized Facebook business pages for maximum reach, engagement, and lead generation.

Skills & Expertise:
-
1. Facebook & Instagram Ads: Campaign creation, audience targeting, ad copywriting, budget management, optimization, reporting.
2. Social Media Marketing: Strategy development, content creation, community management, analytics.
3. Content Marketing: Compelling copywriting, storytelling, content scheduling, SEO optimization.
4. Data Analysis: Interpreting metrics, generating insights, optimizing performance.
5. Project Management: Planning, execution, budget control, client communication.
6. Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication with clients and stakeholders.
7. Software: Facebook Ads Manager, Instagram Ads Manager, Hootsuite, Sprout Social, Google Analytics, Canva.
-
Additional Information:
-
Eager to learn and stay updated on the latest trends in social media advertising and marketing.
Passionate about helping businesses achieve their online goals through effective strategies.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a data-driven approach.

company_summary_description: Poetics is a startup that develops AI related to language and speech communication, with the theme of "creating 21st-century poetics through humanities and science." It does so by crossing over insights from humanities (especially philosophy and literary studies) and various sciences. Since June 2022, the company has started offering its sales analysis AI, "JamRoll" (https://jamroll.poetics-ai.com/), and has been experiencing accelerated growth with an average monthly sales growth rate of 27.5%. So far, it has won over 10 international pitch contests such as Tech in Asia Singapore and ICTSpring, and has been selected as the first cohort of Google Launchpad Accelerator Japan. Additionally, it has been chosen for the "J-Startup" program led by the Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry.
company_summary_overview: Empath Inc. develops Emotion AI Empath, which can identify emotion from the voice in real-time regardless of language. Empath won 1776 Challenge Cup Tokyo 2017 and Accenture Innovation Award at GITEX 2017 in Dubai.

company_summary_description:
EVERY EVENT BEGINS WITH A STORY.

We turn dreams into reality. Weave story into every thread of your event. And conjure a wonderfully collaborative magic to create celebrations that are both unmatched and unforgettable.

One secret? We listen. To understand who you are. Who you want to be. And who (and what) matters most to you. We leave no stone unturned, no detail untended to, no possibility unexplored.

That‚Äôs because the most beautiful event is also the smartest event, and we take pains along every step of the way to deliver both. The initial concepting conversations and the design work that realize your vision are so intrinsically linked, one literally cannot exist without the other. And when we layer in the flawless execution that has become the very essence of who we are, the results are simply spectacular.

Our clients are as unique as our events. Individuals, families, Fortune 500 corporations, and non-profit organizations ‚Äì each looking to create a singular, incomparable experience.

For each, we meet and exceed their highest expectations ‚Äì bringing an artistry to execution renowned around the world.

We are Rafanelli Events, and the best event we‚Äôve ever done is going to be yours.

At Rafanelli Events, innovation and execution are at the heart of our business.", "title": "Founder & Chief Creative Officer", "employment_type": null, "location": null, "date": {"start": "1996-01-01", "end": null}}]}]
profile_summary:
Bryan Rafanelli‚Äôs exquisite sense of style, attention to detail and ability to transform clients‚Äô visions into unforgettable celebrations have made him a go-to planner for the nation‚Äôs most exclusive and high-profile events. He has produced it all, from elaborate fairytale-themed fundraising galas for Massachusetts General Hospital for Children to Chelsea Clinton‚Äôs ‚Äúwedding of the decade‚Äù to State Dinners hosted by President Barack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama. 

Rafanelli Events has a simple philosophy: every event is a unique creative challenge deserving of a one-of-a-kind approach. ‚ÄúMy team listens to what you‚Äôre imagining and then comes back with an idea you never expected,‚Äù he says.

Rafanelli has been named ‚ÄúMan of the Moment‚Äù by Town & Country (2010), a 2011 ‚ÄúInnovator‚Äù and ‚ÄúEvent Producer of the Year‚Äù by BizBash, one of OUT magazine‚Äôs ‚Äú100 Most Compelling People in 2010‚Äù, a ‚ÄúTrendsetter of the Year‚Äù by Modern Bride, a ‚Äú40 Under 40‚Äù by the Boston Business Journal and ‚ÄúBest in Boston‚Äù eight years running by Boston magazine. His events have been highlighted in: The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, The Washington Post, People, New York, CBSNews.com, VanityFair.com, NewYorker.com and more. Rafanelli has also appeared as an industry expert on regional and national television programs including: ‚ÄúThe Martha Stewart Show‚Äù, ABC‚Äôs ‚ÄúGood Morning America‚Äù, NBC‚Äôs ‚ÄúThe Today Show‚Äù and as a regular contributor on New England Cable News‚Äô ‚ÄúMorning Show.‚Äù

Rafanelli grew up in a large Rhode Island family, his mother always finding reason to throw parties for the people she loved. ‚ÄúThe sense of community and of bringing people together to have good time just for ‚Äògood time‚Äôs sake‚Äô has always been inside me,‚Äù he says. He launched Rafanelli Events in 1996 as a three-person operation executing only a handful of events a year. It has quickly evolved into a full-service event design, strategy, planning and production company.

profile_summary:
My name is Andrew and I'm the co-founder of Jambys. Our mission is to make clothes that give you energy at home. We want to make the world's most comfortable clothing. Our awesome team has designed some of the best activewear in the world at places like Nike, Lululemon, and Arc'teryx.  Now we're bringing that same level of innovation to design the world's best clothes for relaxation.

Before Jambys, I was a writer and photographer at GQ.

company_keywords: public policy, education
company_summary_description:
Public Policy Puzzle is born from a simple yet powerful realization: Public Policy affects each of us every day, but too often, it's seen as distant and complex. We aim to change that by empowering individuals - both those who are just starting out and those who have a wealth of experience - to actively engage in shaping the future of our society.
Whether you're a student, a young professional, or an established expert, our platform will offer a space to explore, learn, and meaningfully contribute to public policy.

At the core of our mission is the belief that Public Policy isn't just for government officials; it‚Äôs for everyone who wants to make a difference. We are committed to fostering a vibrant community where Explorers (those eager to learn) and Mentors (experienced professionals and leaders in the field) can connect, share knowledge, and work toward real change.

Together, we can transform the way policy impacts our everyday lives and build a stronger, more inclusive future.

company_location_locations: [{"continent": "Europe", "country": "Austria", "city": "Wien", "street": "Prinz Eugen Stra\u00dfe 8-10/12", "postal_code": "1040", "raw_address": "Prinz Eugen Stra\u00dfe 8-10/12, Wien, Austria, Europe", "position": {"lng": 16.372778, "lat": 48.209206}}]
company_summary_description:
We are cogvis, the experts for intelligent analysis of 3D data and images. Founded 10 years ago as a spin-off of TU Wien we develop and sell highly innovative AAL (Active and Assisted Living) solutions, allowing to ease the life and increase the safety of the elderly and senior citizens. 
Our main product is CogvisAI - the intelligent 3D sensor. It detects and prevents falls, offers functions to increase the safety of patients and staff and can detect the absence or movement of patients. Additionally, we are working on further innovative workplace solutions for rehabilitation and the support of care.
company_summary_overview:
CogvisAI is a human behavior analytic platform in order to support caregivers. It significantly reduces routine monitoring and administrative work and let nurses focus on people-centered care. 
We increase the productivity of nursing homes by up to 30% and enhance the safety of patients by preventing more than 70% of fall related incidents. Founded in 2007 as a spin-off of the TU Wien we specialize in computer vision, machine learning and 3D data analytics. We are applying our technology already to support the care of elderly and cognitive impaired people, in psychosocial institutions, oncology departments, rehabilitation centers, etc. Furthermore, it is the basis for our occupational health, robotics and physical therapy applications.
company_summary_seo: Die smarte Pflegel√∂sung f√ºr maximale Sicherheit im Pflegealltag. cogvisAI ist eine modulbasierte Pflegel√∂sung f√ºr die Bereiche Sicherheit, Sturz, Aktivit√§ten und Demenz. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit ExpertInnen aus den Bereichen Technologie und Pflege entstand cogvisAI mit der Vision, die Zukunft der Pflege nachhaltig zu ver√§ndern. Verbessern Sie die Lebensqualit√§t pflegebed√ºrftiger Menschen und entlasten Sie das Pflegepersonal durch eine Innovation made in Austria.

company_summary_description:
KLASSROOM EDUTECH ECOSYSTEM
India's leading Offline to Online Hybrid (O2O) tutoring platform.
Rural Market: Klassroom offers a one-of-a-kind LIVE interactive learning experience to students. Klassroom has an extremely talented group of highly Experienced Teachers, from top Institutions, teaching extensive courses to students of ICSE, CBSE, and State Boards from classes 8 to 12, IIT-JEE, NEET, CA, and other competitive exams through LIVE classes & Klassroom Platform.

 Urban Market: Klassroom‚Äôs Hybrid Business Model enables it to give the students option of enrolling at 160+ centres present in two cities - Mumbai and Delhi, where Klassroom offers physical tutoring to its students through partner institutes along with Klassroom Live Tutoring.
Klassroom with its partner program onboards only the best and curated institutes in a locality to offer a choice to students select offline centres available in their locality. Students can discover and learn about the offline centres from their home and can Book a Visit to partner centres to enquire and enrol. Students enrolling though Klassroom get free limited access to Klassroom Online platform
The Covid-19 Pandemic challenged us to focus and strengthen our online offering and transform into the best hybrid tutoring platform in the country. Once the situation normalises, we can focus on expanding our centres across cities along with world-class online tutoring offering. 
Klassroom targets Rurban (Rural + Urban) population with the keen intent of making quality coaching accessible to all.
Klassroom Video: https://youtu.be/gi_kIS7HzBE

Klassroom Presence

10000+ Students from 300+ cities across 22+ states have availed Top class Klassroom Live tutoring of 100000+ Hours. Additionally, 160+ physical centres in Mumbai and Delhi have over 1000 students.
company_summary_overview: Klassroom Edutech is a hybrid tutoring platform that offers courses and skill-based training programs. The company's app provides a learning ecosystem, offering content that includes academics, skill-based training for industry jobs, career courses, and language learning.
company_summary_seo: India‚Äôs Branded Network Of Coaching Classes. Now book coaching classes seat online through Klassroom & get various benefits for your child

profile_summary:
Herv√© Schauer est un expert renomm√© internationalement en cybers√©curit√© (ou s√©curit√© des syst√®mes d‚Äôinformation).

Herv√© SchauerApr√®s des √©tudes d‚Äôinformatique √† l‚ÄôUniversit√© Paris 6 (Jussieu), il s‚Äôaffirme tr√®s t√¥t comme un des pionniers de la s√©curit√© informatique en France, avec (entre autres) la publication d√®s 1987 d‚Äôune s√©rie d‚Äôarticles sur la s√©curit√© Unix et la d√©tection d‚Äôintrusion.
Il fonde son propre cabinet (Herv√© Schauer Consultants) en 1989 et le c√®de √† un cabinet d‚Äôaudit en 2015, puis cr√©√© √† nouveau sa propre soci√©t√© de formation HS2. Il est l‚Äôinventeur du relayage applicatif (proxy firewall) pour l‚Äôagence fran√ßaise de l‚Äôespace (CNES) en 1991, pr√©sent√© au Usenix Security Symposium en 1992, mais n‚Äôa pas br√®vet√© son invention, ainsi celle-ci a √©t√© utilis√©e librement par la suite dans la majorit√© des firewalls commerciaux.

Herv√© Schauer a publi√© ou contribu√© √† de nombreux ouvrages et articles , notamment sur la s√©curit√© Internet, le cloisonnement de r√©seaux, dont il est √† l‚Äôorigine, l‚Äôauthentification, la s√©curit√© des technologies sans fil, les normes ISO 27001 (syst√®me de management de la s√©curit√© de l‚Äôinformation) et ISO 27005 (gestion des risques en s√©curit√©), et la cybers√©curit√© des syst√®mes industriels.

Herv√© Schauer a √©t√© consultant pour plus de 400 soci√©t√©s fran√ßaises et mondiales, des op√©rateurs de t√©l√©communication, des gouvernements francophones et des organisations internationales.
Il participe √† la dispense de formations : sur les normes (ISO27001, ISO27005, ISO22301), RSSI, et la cybers√©curit√© des syst√®mes industrielsI.
Il est expert judiciaire en informatique depuis 2011.

Herv√© Schauer co-anime notamment le groupe parisien de l‚ÄôOSSIR depuis 1989 et le groupe cybers√©curit√© des syst√®mes industriels du Clusif, a co-fond√© l‚ÄôOSSIR et les chapitres fran√ßais de l‚ÄôISOC et de l‚ÄôISSA, et a lanc√© le Club 27001 (chapitre fran√ßais de l‚ÄôISMS Users Group).
Herv√© Schauer est √©lu aux conseils d‚Äôadministration de l‚ÄôOSSIR, du Club 27001 et du Clusif.

company_summary_description:
Retec Group is a UK-based consultancy helping retailers deliver complex technology change - faster, more reliably, and with confidence.

We specialise in hands-on delivery across retail and hospitality, bringing deep sector knowledge and practical experience to transformation programmes. From replacing legacy platforms to enabling new propositions, we help clients get clarity, build momentum, and make real progress.

We‚Äôre not a traditional consultancy. Our team works shoulder to shoulder with clients to lead, manage, and deliver change - not just advise on it.

Whether you need interim leadership, support across a major programme, or help getting a struggling project back on track, Retec is built to deliver.

Our Core Services:
‚óè Programme & Project Leadership
‚óè Business Analysis & Requirements Definition
‚óè Technology Delivery & Implementation Support
‚óè Change & Adoption Management
‚óè Delivery Health Checks & Turnaround Planning

company_summary_description:
Cuneiform: Translating Stories into Digital Success

At Cuneiform, we specialize in transforming ideas into impactful digital solutions. Based in Cape Town, South Africa, we provide expert web development, software services, design, UX, digital marketing, and branding to businesses across the globe, with a focus on the U.S. market.

Our mission is simple yet powerful: to empower brands by blending creativity with cutting-edge technology. With nearly a decade of experience, we've grown from serving local clients to building strong partnerships with Silicon Valley startups and global innovators.

What We Offer:

Web Development & Software Services: Crafting reliable, scalable solutions that meet modern business needs.

Design & UX: Creating intuitive, user-friendly experiences that drive engagement.

Digital Marketing & Branding: Building strong brand identities and driving results through strategic campaigns.


Cuneiform, named after the ancient storytelling script, symbolizes our commitment to translating your brand's story into a compelling digital presence.

Let‚Äôs collaborate to bring your vision to life.

Explore our work: www.cuneiform.co.za
We create stories out of ideas, from Product Conception, to Corporate Identity and branding, narrative strategy, and overall digital presence and impact. 
The story of your brand ‚Äì its trials and its triumphs ‚Äì is what makes it unique. And that story, in the right hands, can be magically translated in the digital space and made manifest in the real world.

At Cuneiform we act as catalysts, harnessing the right tools to tell your story and connect you with your audience, where magic happens.

profile_summary:
Anya is the Chief Dreamscaper and founder of Cuneiform, a digital services company that specializes in digital storytelling, digital marketing solutions, and design and web development for entrepreneurs and SMEs. She is also the Founding Partner of Exponential Impact, a company dedicated to building an ecosystem of accelerators, incubators, tools, and services that enable entrepreneurs, social impact champions and organizations to scale their positive impact on the world.

The entrepreneurial journey forged her into a resilient, adaptable leader who understands how to navigate the complexities of building businesses with heart. She has worked with notable South African companies until she scaled into the USA (specifically Silicon Valley) and Scandinavia.  Anya loves playing the role of virtual co-founder and advisor to early-stage entrepreneurs and her focus remains on delivering lean, human-centered digital solutions that empower businesses to make a difference.

Anya excels in strategic thinking, storytelling, and founder support, with a particular talent for bootstrapping and building from the ground up. She is passionate about fostering collaboration and inclusion, creating spaces where diverse voices come together to build comprehensive and impactful solutions.

Anya‚Äôs fascination with the universe began as a child, influenced by mentors like Carl Sagan and Ann Druyan, who shaped her understanding of the Cosmos and our place in it, the human condition, and human connection and purpose. While her academic journey started with a focus on astronomy, it was her passion for innovation and human-centric business that led her to entrepreneurship.

Today, she channels that same curiosity and drive into helping businesses make an impact, believing that the lessons from the Cosmos can be applied to our work on Earth. Based between South Africa and the Netherlands, Anya blends her global experiences with a deep commitment to positive change. When she‚Äôs not dreaming up new ways to change the world, she‚Äôs raising her five amazing children and enjoying the creative outlet of writing.

With a strong belief that true change requires strategy, resilience, and community, she continues to teach and lead, one meaningful connection at a time.

Anya says: 

I see a tomorrow where, through technology, science and education we create a society that is truly benign, mostly fulfilled, and filled with explorers.

Lem Labs, LLC strives to provide innovative solutions to engineering problems in a variety of technical industries. Today's dynamic world demands multi-disciplinary expertise, fusing together mechanical and electrical techologies.

Lem Labs, LLC conducts research, develops new and existing technologies, provides subject matter expertise and consulting.

The engineering staff of Lem Labs, LLC embodies a core set of professional values and practices. This cornerstone of our company upholds the highest standards of technical excellence, intellectual integrity, and a strong work ethic. Our genuine desire to learn transforms our work into a personal as well as professional goal.

We are always looking for new job opportunities for design, R&D, prototyping, and machine shop work.

projects:
[{"title": "Terminal Swimmer Detection & Targeting; Sponsoring Agency: ONR", "description": "Mechanical design engineer on development and build of QNA’s first Unmanned Surface Vehicle (USV): Blackfish 

It was named as one of the Best of What's New in security products 2011 from Popular Science

Project involved a complete build of the vehicle, integrating mechanical, electrical and software systems.  It was designed to search and track divers in the water using a deployable sonar sensor suite. 

Worked closely with a yacht contractor to transform the ProE design into a custom fiberglass upper hull cover which housed all the electromechanical systems.

At The. Cmute, we believe that great design isn‚Äôt just about looking good; it‚Äôs about making a statement. Our mission is to create compelling, unapologetic designs that not only stand out but also tell your brand's story in the most impactful way. With a team of passionate designers and visionaries, we are committed to pushing the boundaries of creativity to deliver designs that are as distinctive as your brand.

profile_summary:
As a dedicated designer since 2018, I‚Äôve honed my skills in web design, UI/UX, and branding, working with over 30 clients and creating more than 3,000 designs. 

My passion lies in crafting user-focused digital experiences that are not just visually compelling but also intuitive and functional. I believe that great design is about solving problems creatively and effectively, and I thrive on bringing ideas to life in ways that elevate brand presence and engage users. My journey in design is driven by a commitment to innovation, quality, and a genuine love for what I do.

In 2024, I founded TheCmute, a brand built to empower startups, businesses, and creators with comprehensive design solutions. Actually TheCmute was ideated back in 2018 only as a university project, but it was formally realized last year only. 

TheCmute, we focus on providing all-in-one creative services, from unlimited design requests and custom branding to website development and ongoing support. We aim to help our clients launch and scale their businesses with cohesive and high-impact visuals, all from a single, reliable platform. Whether you're just starting or looking to elevate your brand, thecmute is here to deliver consistent, tailored design services that make a difference. 

Let‚Äôs connect to explore how we can bring your creative vision to life!

With 50+ psychologists across India, we support individuals, families, and organizations through real-life challenges using clinical insight, trauma-informed care, and thoughtful therapist matching.

It‚Äôs a system of care.
And we‚Äôre here to make it work‚Äîfor you.

profile_summary:
I‚Äôm the founder of Healism, a trusted mental health platform offering kind, professional care through one-on-one therapy, emotional support, and personalised well-being programs.
With a team of 50+ psychologists across India, we support individuals, families, and workplaces through real-life struggles using professional knowledge, trauma-informed care, and thoughtful therapist matching.

At Healism, mental health isn‚Äôt just a service.
It‚Äôs a system of care.
And we‚Äôre here to make it work‚Äîfor you.

---

Outside of Healism, I‚Äôve spent the past 3+ years teaching French, Psychology, Conversational English and Art to learners across the world - including students from India, Dubai, Egypt, and the Netherlands. I create safe learning spaces where people feel seen, understood, and supported.

My work is shaped by a deep love for what makes us human, our feelings, our stories, our losses, our healing, our creativity, and the quiet moments of love and kindness.

I‚Äôm deeply invested in what it means to be human in all its complexity.
Grief, slowness, softness, shadow work, creativity, and the quiet power of love - these aren‚Äôt distractions from productivity; they‚Äôre the raw material of real transformation.

I believe in care that is:
1. Thoughtful ‚Äì grounded in real understanding and experience
2. Warm ‚Äì rooted in trust, empathy, and connection
3. Deeply human ‚Äì accepting all parts of us, even the messy or sensitive ones

If you're someone who cares deeply about mental health, psychology, or simply being more human in a fast world, I‚Äôd love to connect.

company_summary_description:
Aturian is now part of OrderMyGear (OMG)! And we're working on something big. Learn more here: https://info.ordermygear.com/presentations-order-management-early-access

Aturian is the ERP solution built specifically for the promotional products industry.  A complete Cloud-Based Business Management Solution supporting distributors of every size and employees in every role.    Handling everything from Proposals to Payment, our system keeps track of everything so you can focus on your business. Built and advised by leaders in the Promotional Products Industry.
company_summary_overview:
Aturian offers business management solution supporting promotional distributors of every size and employees in every role.

It visualizes critical data insights with graphs and reports customized for each user. Aturian also provides a comprehensive suite of reports necessary to successfully manage day-to-day and year-to-year.
